TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeDomSerializerBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 类提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作之间的共享基和类。The class is used as a shared base between the and classes. 公共类派生自类。Public classes derive from the class. 每个公共类定义其自己的公共 API。Each public class defines its own public API. 类定义公共 API，但确实提供了多种可用于帮助序列化过程的实用工具方法。The class defines no public API, but does offer a multitude of utility methods that can be used to aid the serialization process.

The to interpret.

summary.span: 将给定表达式反序列化为内存中的对象。

span.span: Deserializes the given expression into an in-memory object.

returns.span: 从 的解释生成的对象。

span.span: An object resulting from interpretation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个帮助程序方法的派生类可以调用要反序列化表达式。This is a helper method that derived classes can call to deserialize an expression. 它进行反序列化该语句通过解释并执行指定的 CodeDOM 表达式`expression`参数，然后将结果返回。It deserializes the statement by interpreting and executing the CodeDOM expression specified by the `expression` parameter, and then returns the results. 如果需要作为此表达式的结果创建一个对象，将为其提供指定的名称`name`参数。If an object needs to be created as a result of this expression, it will be given the name specified by the `name` parameter. 名称可以是`null`如果不需要命名该对象。The name can be `null` if there is no need to name the object. 下表描述了如何特定表达式进行处理。The following table describes how specific expressions are handled. |表达式Expression|行为Behavior| |----------------|--------------| ||此表达式表示`this`或`Me`。This expression represents `this` or `Me`. 若要查找与此表达式中，关联的对象方法将查找上下文堆栈中。To locate the object that is associated with this expression, the method will look in the context stack for a . 此对象包含在关系图和表示它的表达式的根对象。This object contains the root object of the graph and the expression that represents it. 如果对象存在，并且该表达式匹配，则返回的根对象。If the object is present and the expression matches, the root object will be returned. 如果实例找不到，则会报告错误。An error is reported if an instance cannot be located.| ||如果字段引用的目标计算结果为根对象，将使用的管理器参数的方法来检索基于名称的对象实例。If the target of the field reference evaluates to the root object, the method of the manager parameter will be used to retrieve the object instance based on name. 否则，标准反射用于对目标对象找到请求的字段。Otherwise, standard reflection is used against the target object to locate the requested field. 如果该字段不能定位，报告错误。An error is reported if the field cannot be located.| ||方法的`manager`使用参数来查找实例表示的给定变量的名称。The method of the `manager` parameter is used to locate the instance representing the given variable name. 如果实例找不到，则会报告错误。An error is reported if an instance cannot be located.| 继续解释表达式，直到它们全部解析到对象，或它不再可简化的表达式。 continues to interpret expressions until they are completely resolved to an object, or until it can no longer simplify the expression. 在这种情况下，将返回，其中包含最简单的表达式。In this case, will return a that contains the most simplified expression. 不支持以下表达式：The following expressions are not supported: - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化以获取对象的实例调用方法。The method is invoked during deserialization to obtain an instance of an object. 此调用时，应返回所请求类型的实例。When this is called, an instance of the requested type should be returned. 默认实现调用方法的`manager`参数。The default implementation invokes the method of the `manager` parameter.

param.span: 筛选将反序列化哪些属性的 数组。

summary.span: 反序列化来自固定区域性资源包的给定对象的属性。

span.span: Deserializes properties on the given object from the invariant culture’s resource bundle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是可以调用派生类的帮助器方法。The method is a helper method that derived classes can call. 它查找给定对象上的属性，并尝试加载其固定区域性的资源包的值。It looks for properties on the given object and attempts to load their values out of the invariant culture’s resource bundle. 这通常用于处理不发送到源代码的设计时属性。This is generally used to handle design-time properties that are not emitted into source code. 它不应本地化属性因为它仅对固定区域性进行操作。It should not be used for localized properties because it only operates on the invariant culture. 此方法会检查所有的属性`value`参数指定的属性相匹配`filter`参数，然后检查资源二进制对象中的这些属性。This method inspects all of the properties of the `value` parameter that match the attributes specified by the `filter` parameter, and then checks for those properties in a resource binary object. 这可用于反序列化属性不能在代码中，如设计时属性表示。This is useful for deserializing properties that cannot be represented in code, such as design-time properties. 此方法要求设计器加载程序，提供了读取资源。This method requires that a designer loader offers an to read resources. 如果提供了用于固定区域性，然后将从 XML 资源 (.resx) 文件的元数据部分中，这不包括在最终的编译代码中读取资源。If the provides a for the invariant culture, then will read resources from the XML resource (.resx) file’s metadata section, which is not included in final compiled code. 如果此服务不可用，将不读取任何资源。If this service is not available, no resources will be read.

param.span: 要为其获取表达式的对象。

span.span: The object for which to get an expression.

summary.span: 返回给定对象的表达式。

span.span: Returns an expression for the given object.

returns.span: 表示 的 ，或者，如果没有 的现有表达式，则为 。

span.span: A representing , or if there is no existing expression for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个表示给定的对象的表达式。The method returns an expression representing the given object. 它可以返回`null`，以指示，任何表达式已设置的描述的对象。It can return `null`, indicating that no expression has been set that describes the object. 表达式中的三种方式之一获取：Expressions are acquired in one of three ways: - 表达式可能是以前调用的结果方法。The expression could be the result of a prior call to the method. - 表达式未能中找到。The expression could have been found in the . - 无法通过派生表达式。The expression could be derived through . 若要派生通过表达式，则方法查询给定对象的名称引用服务。To derive expressions through , the method queries the reference service for a name for the given object. 如果表达式服务将返回有效的名称， ，则方法进行检查以查看是否存在"。"在名称中。If the expression service returns a valid name, , the method checks to see if there is a "." in the name. 这表示，表达式服务对另一个对象作为只读属性的返回值找到此对象。This indicates that the expression service found this object as the return value of a read-only property on another object. 如果没有"。"，将拆分为部分的引用。If there is a ".", will split the reference into parts. 最左侧是一个名称，将使用计算方法。The leftmost part is a name that will be evaluated with the method. 为每个后续部分中，将生成的属性引用表达式。For each subsequent part, a property reference expression will be built. 然后，将返回最终的表达式。The final expression will then be returned. 如果该对象不具有表达式设置，或在引用服务中，找不到对象将返回`null`，指示对象没有现有表达式。If the object did not have an expression set, or if the object was not found in the reference service, will return `null`, indicating there is no existing expression for the object.

A that is appropriate for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是扩展方法。The method is an extension to the method. 方法采用一个对象类型，而不是一个对象值。The method takes an object type, rather than an object value. 如果外部当事方已重写通过特定对象的元数据，该元数据重写将不会看到方法，它仅使用一种类型。If an external party had overridden metadata for a specific object through , that metadata override would not be seen by the method, which only takes a type. 方法检查值和值的类型的元数据。The method checks the metadata of the value and the value’s type. 如果两个不同，看起来是否存在自定义设计器序列化程序属性的值。If the two differ, will look to see if there is a custom designer serializer attribute on the value. 如果是这样，将尝试使用它。If so, will attempt to use it. 否则，它将会推迟到。Otherwise, it will defer to .

span.span: or is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是可以调用派生类的帮助器方法。The method is a helper method that derived classes can call. 查看属性在其`value`匹配的参数`filter`参数，然后化为固定区域性资源包的属性。It looks at properties on the `value` parameter that match the `filter` parameter, and then it serializes the properties into the invariant culture resource bundle. 如果资源服务返回，属性值将存储在 XML 资源 (.resx) 文件的元数据部分。If the resource service returns a , the property values will be stored in the metadata section of the XML resource (.resx) file. `statements`未使用参数。The `statements` parameter is not used. 要作为资源序列化，该属性必须非常简单 （不是内容属性） 和其值必须是可序列化。To be serialized as a resource, a property must be simple (not a content property) and its value must be serializable. 将跳过不符合此模式的属性。Properties that do not conform to this pattern will be skipped. 需要若要获取编写用于固定区域性的资源。 requires an to obtain a to write resources for the invariant culture. 如果此服务不可用，将不写入任何资源。If this service is not available, no resources will be written.

summary.span: 将给定对象序列化为使用给定资源名称的资源包。

span.span: Serializes the given object into a resource bundle using the given resource name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是使用给定名称的资源包值序列化为一个帮助器方法。The method is a helper method that serializes a value to a resource bundle under the given name. 通过搜索序列化管理器确定资源写入到的区域性属性的集合称为`ResourceCulture`。The culture that the resource is written to is determined by searching the serialization manager’s collection for a property called `ResourceCulture`. 如果存在此属性，资源将写入该区域性。If this property exists, resources will be written to that culture. 否则，资源将写入到固定区域性。Otherwise, resources will be written to the invariant culture. `value`参数必须是可序列化。The `value` parameter must be serializable. 需要若要获取编写正确的区域性的资源。 requires an to obtain a to write resources for the correct culture. 如果此服务不可用，改为将生成表示的资源的代码中的二进制对象。If this service is not available, will instead build a binary object in code that represents the resource.

para.span: 是一个读写属性，通过序列化管理器的访问集合。

span.span: is a read-write property that is accessed through the serialization manager’s collection.

para.span: 方法永远不会更改此属性的值; 它只是读取来识别将写入的区域性。

span.span: The method never changes the value of this property; it merely reads it to identify the culture to which it will write.

para.span: 分析和加载资源时，反序列化期间设置属性。

span.span: The property is set during deserialization as resources are parsed and loaded.

span.span: The to use for serialization.
The object to serialize.
Can be .

summary.span: 将给定对象序列化为表达式。

span.span: Serializes the given object into an expression.

returns.span: 如果 可以序列化，则为 对象；否则为 。

span.span: A object if can be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`参数可以是`null`，在这种情况下将返回的基元表达式。The `value` parameter can be `null`, in which case a primitive expression will be returned. 方法用来序列化类型的以下规则：The method uses the following rules for serializing types: 1. 它首先调用方法，查看是否为该对象已创建了一个表达式。It first calls the method to see if an expression has already been created for the object. 如果有，则返回现有表达式。If so, it returns the existing expression. 2. 然后，定位的对象序列化程序，并要求它序列化。It then locates the object’s serializer, and asks it to serialize. 3. 如果该对象的序列化程序的返回值是，返回的表达式。If the return value of the object’s serializer is a , the expression is returned. 4. 它将指定一个到最后一次调用成为序列化程序是否添加表达式。It makes one last call to to see if the serializer added an expression. 5. 最后，它会返回`null`。Finally, it returns `null`. 如果无法创建任何表达式，并且找不到任何合适的序列化程序，将通过序列化管理器报告错误。If no expression could be created and no suitable serializer could be found, an error will be reported through the serialization manager. 如果找到一个序列化程序，但它无法生成一个表达式，将不报告任何错误。No error will be reported if a serializer was found but it failed to produce an expression. 在这种情况下，假定序列化程序或者已报告错误或未尝试序列化对象。In this case, it is assumed that the serializer either already reported the error or it did not attempt to serialize the object. 如果序列化程序返回一个语句的集合，这些语句将不会被放弃。If the serializer returned a statement or a collection of statements, those statements will not be discarded. 方法将首先查找在上下文堆栈，并将语句添加到语句上下文对象的属性。The method will first look for a on the context stack and add statements to the statement context object's property. 如果没有语句上下文，方法将查找的上下文中为并添加语句存在。If there is no statement context, the method will look in the context for a and add the statements there. 如果不能被找到任何要添加语句，将生成错误。If no place can be found to add the statements, an error will be generated. > [!NOTE] > 不应调用方法内的时序列化自己的对象。You should not call the method within when serializing your own object. 相反，应调用。Instead, you should call . 如果它返回`null`，创建你自己的表达式和调用。If it returns `null`, create your own expression and call . 然后继续执行剩余的序列化。Then proceed with the rest of your serialization.

returns.span: 将 作为序列化的表达式包含在内的 。

span.span: A containing as a serialized expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是序列化到的资源表达式的值的帮助器方法。The method is a helper method that serializes a value to a resource expression. 这是与方法，将值写入到的资源的二进制对象。This is in contrast to the method, which writes a value to a resource binary object. 更进一步，并返回一个表达式，可用于恢复资源。 goes one step further and returns an expression that can be used to recover the resource. 例如，返回值可能是"rm。GetValue("SomeBitmap");"。For example, the return value might be "rm.GetValue("SomeBitmap");". 从计算资源的名称，如果其中一个可以在上下文堆栈上找到。The name of the resource is calculated from the , if one can be found on the context stack. 方法将查找以下对象：The method will look on the for the following objects: - -要添加的资源管理器，如果需要声明一个语句的集合。—a collection of statements to add a resource manager to, if one needs to be declared. - -根表达式，需要创建一个资源管理器。—the root expression, which is needed to create a resource manager. - -使用生成的资源名称，并决定哪种类型的资源管理器调用以发起。—used to fabricate a name for the resource and to decide what type of resource manager call to make.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ensureInvariant`参数是`true`，则方法将还写入资源值固定区域性的资源文件如果当前`ResourceCulture`不是固定的区域性...If the `ensureInvariant` parameter is `true`, the method will also write the resource value into the invariant culture’s resource file if the current `ResourceCulture` is not the invariant culture..

summary.span: 将一个对象与表达式相关联。

span.span: Associates an object with an expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是将相关联的帮助器方法的对象。The method is a helper method that associates a with an object. 在这种方式中使用表达式相关联的对象是可通过访问方法。Objects that have been associated with expressions in this way are accessible through the method. 将其表达式的表存储为上下文堆栈上的附加对象，使其可由任何序列化程序的方法。 stores its expression table as an appended object on the context stack so it is accessible by any serializer’s method.
